"@ArcticEight":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5563ef3d6368723a72491700#post_5563ef3d6368723a72491700
[bq="ArcticEight"]*OMG*

I don't know how many of you will care about this but... I'm so happy for my friend! Tonight he speed ran Mario 64 like usual, 70 star this time... and guess what? He ended up in second. Yes, second _worldwide_.[/bq]
The hype continues into the next page.

topics.body: then imagine me, holding down my position with a few soldiers, using my russian ability to produce musketmman in 1 turn and spend 10-20 turns battling that guys army, losing tons of soldiers, land improvements and almost losing my capital
topics.author: 5154c5237f123bcd580002fc

topics.body:
then imagine me pumping out so many soldiers at once i actually manage to kill his entire army

then imagine the guy saying "you won, congratulations, you defended well" and quitting the game, leaving me as the last player standing

topics.body:
Hey is anyone else having issues of not being able to watch videos on Youtube using Firefox?

YouTube looks like this for me right now where nothing plays.
!http://i.imgur.com/VR4KSVT.png!

And when I click to watch a video. This happens.
!http://i.imgur.com/bCsITXG.png!

The only page that seems to be unaffected was the upload videos page. But then at the top of the page gave me this message.
"This page will become unavailable after June 1, 2015. Please update your browser and enable javascript."
!http://i.imgur.com/mPtZbtL.png!
